public java.lang.String retrieveHomePage(org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • getAppointments

        @GetMapping(path="/appointmentsResponseBody")
 @ResponseBody
public java.lang.String getAppointments(@RequestParam(value="searchString",required=false)
                                                                                                       java.lang.String searchString)
        GET Controller for getting all appointments if based on the search string. If Search parameter is used, then get appointments only if description column contain search string parameter. This method returns a response body.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        searchString - the search string
        Returns:
        all appointments if search string is empty or null, Otherwise get appointments only if description column contain search string parameter.

      • getAppointmentsResponseEntity

        @GetMapping(path="/appointments")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getAppointmentsResponseEntity(@RequestParam(value="searchString",required=false)
                                                                                                                   java.lang.String searchString)
        GET Controller for getting all appointments based on the search string. If Search parameter is used, then get appointments only if description column contain search string parameter This method returns a response entity.
        Parameters:
        model - the model
        searchString - the search string
        errors - the errors
        Returns:
        all appointments if search string is empty or null, Otherwise get appointments only if description column contain search string parameter.
